item.title: Eviction Rate Regression Model
item.description: Findings 1 Modeling Census Tract Level Evictions : Correlates Of Eviction Rates The following variables were significantly associated with census tract level evictions. Socio-demographic: Percentage of tract that is Black or African American (+), Percentage of tract aged 16+ who are unemployed (+), Census tract poverty rate (+), Percentage of tract with a bachelorâ€™s degree (-), State Policy factors Number of exemptions to Fair Housing Laws (landlord friendly) (+), Number of exemptions landlords have from state landlord-tenant law (landlord friendly) (+), Number of legal remedies available to tenants (-), Number of total legal remedies available to landlords (-), 4.
